projects.title: Mesia Mesh
projects.technologies: React.js, CSS, Bootstrap, Axios, Node.js, Express.js, Cloudinary, Passport.js, BCrypt, mySQL
projects.description: A social media website for artists and creative minds to share their work in a safe and encouraging environment.

projects.title: Python Note Taker
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, Python, Flask, Jinja2, SQLite
projects.description: A note taking application that uses Python and SQLite to create, update, delete, and view tasks.

projects.title: Stickley Designs
projects.description: A website I built for a client that designs and writes shows for marching bands. The website is full responsive featuring a contact page to message him directly.

projects.title: Employee Directory
projects.description: An app that displays an Employee Directory from a random user API. The directory can be filtered to show employees based off of gender.

projects.title: The Ender Maze
projects.description: An RPG where you can create your own class and go through a maze as your character fighting enemies and solving puzzles.

projects.title: Got Jobs?
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, API calls,  Themuse API, Mapquest API, Teleport API, Plotly
projects.description: A job search app for someone looking to relocate to a new city. The user searches for a city and job type and the page populates with job information and quality of life information for the city.
